definition: to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: NASA's Voyager 1 spacecraft has reached the outside edge of the solar system.
sentences.chinese: NASA的旅行者1号已到达太阳系外缘。

sentences.english: And the universe outside our solar system seems to abound with potential homes.
sentences.chinese: 太阳系外茫茫宇宙之中，似乎充满了可能的生命家园。

sentences.english: Earth, our home, is the third planet from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 我们的家园地球，是太阳系的第三颗行星。

sentences.english: It will also help with the search for extrasolar planets.
sentences.chinese: 它还能帮助寻找太阳系以外的行星。

sentences.english: Indeed, Ganymede is the largest moon in the whole solar system.
sentences.chinese: 的确，格尼梅德星是整个太阳系最大的卫星。

sentences.english: The solar system is part of one of such self generating cosmic exertions .
sentences.chinese: 太阳系是这些自发的宇宙运转活动中的一部分。

sentences.english: It's the largest known vortex in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 它是太阳系中已知的旋涡中最大的一个。

sentences.english: The Sun is rich in helium, as are the solar system’s gas giant planets.
sentences.chinese: 太阳作为太阳系中的气体巨行星，氦含量丰富。

sentences.english: Scientists first discovered an extrasolar planet in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，科学家发现了第一颗太阳系之外的行星。

sentences.english: The earth is the fifth-largest planet in our solar system .
sentences.chinese: 在我们的太阳系地球是第五大行星。

sentences.english: Our own solar system appears to be chocked with dead worlds.
sentences.chinese: 我们独一的太阳系似乎要被死寂的世界给淹没了。

sentences.english: The mind boggles at the idea of life on the other planets of the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 在太阳系其他行星上有生命存在的想法令人难以置信。

sentences.english: What mysteries do you know about the nine planets in the solar system?
sentences.chinese: 关于太阳系里的九大行星，你知道哪些奥秘？

sentences.english: It represents the plane of the solar system, with the official name of "the ecliptic."
sentences.chinese: 这代表太阳系平面，学名“黄道”。

sentences.english: Innermost planet Mercury is below Venus, to the right.
sentences.chinese: 太阳系中最靠内的水星位于金星右下方。

sentences.english: It is over twenty-five kilometers high and the largest known volcano in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 它高25千米多，是太阳系中所知道的最大的火山。

definition: see 恆星系|恒星系[heng2 xing1 xi4]
asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter
celestial body (e.g. planet, satellite etc)/heavenly body
extragalactic star system/galaxy (not including our Galaxy)
